prompt: Stock photo style, a smiling software developer at a clean white desk, holding a coffee cup, bright morning lighting, optimistic, high quality
vo: Day one. Clean desk, fresh coffee, and a heart full of hope.

prompt: Close up of a pristine laptop screen showing a blank terminal, reflection of a happy face, clean minimal workspace
vo: I'm going to write the cleanest shell script the world has ever seen.

prompt: Developer typing aggressively but happily, code flowing on screen, 'Hello World', sunny window background
vo: Look at those fingers fly! pure productivity machine.

prompt: Screen close up, typing 'Write a simple shell script' into an AI chat window, green checkmarks
vo: Just a simple request to the AI. 'Write me a script'. Easy.

prompt: Developer leaning back in chair, hands behind head, smiling at monitor, 'This will be easy'
vo: This is going to save me so much time. I love the future.

prompt: Extreme close up of coffee mug 'World's Best Dev', steam rising, bright lighting
vo: Ah, coffee. The nectar of the gods. Nothing can go wrong.

prompt: Developer looking at screen, tapping fingers patiently, still smiling
vo: Just waiting for the code. Any second now...

prompt: Monitor showing a block of code appeared, developer looks pleased
vo: There it is! Code generated. Life is good.

prompt: Developer squinting at the screen, head tilted, 'Wait, what is this?', slight shadow falls on room
vo: Wait. What is that? That doesn't look like bash.

prompt: Close up of hand scrolling mouse wheel hesitantly, screen shows weird unicode characters
vo: Why are there... ancient runes in my terminal?

prompt: Monitor close up, shell script contains strange alien symbols instead of text, glitch effect
vo: Is that a glitched unicode character? Or is the AI cursing me?

prompt: Developer rubbing eyes, 'Did I read that right?', lighting gets slightly dimmer
vo: Let me just rub my eyes. Maybe I'm hallucinating.

prompt: Developer typing 'Please fix the escaping', face neutral, slightly annoyed
vo: I'll just ask it nicely to fix the escaping. Simple.

prompt: Developer staring at loading spinner, biting lip, room slightly darker
vo: Generating again... surely it understands 'no emojis in bash'.

prompt: Screen shows AI response: 'Here is the same code again', developer looks baffled
vo: It sent the exact same code. With more glitches.

prompt: Developer scratching head, messing up hair slightly, 'Why?', grey lighting
vo: I don't understand. It's a simple string replacement!

prompt: Mid shot, developer pointing at screen, mouth open in shout, 'No!', red tint in lighting
vo: No! You stupid machine! That is NOT how you escape a quote!

prompt: Close up of fingers hammering keys violently, keyboard shaking
vo: I am typing so hard I might break the spacebar!

prompt: Eyes narrowed, reflection of red error text in glasses, angry expression
vo: Read! My! Text! No unicode! ASCII only!

prompt: Hand hits coffee mug, coffee spills on desk, developer ignores it, focused on rage
vo: Who cares about the coffee! Fix the script!

prompt: Developer yelling into the microphone 'ESCAPE THE CHARACTERS', vein popping in forehead
vo: ESCAPE! THE! CHARACTERS! Do you speak English?!

prompt: Developer grabbing monitor with both hands, shaking it, screen glitches
vo: I will shake this monitor until the bytes fall into place!

prompt: Screen close up, AI says 'I cannot do that Dave', red text, ominously calm
vo: Did it just tell me 'I'm afraid I can't do that'?

prompt: Developer kicking the chair away, standing up, pacing, messy room
vo: That's it! Physical violence is the only answer!

prompt: Developer slumping in chair, head on desk, room is dark and blue, rain against window
vo: It's over. The machine has won. I am defeated.

prompt: Close up, face buried in hands, sobbing silently, 'It's just a shell script'
vo: I just wanted to automate one backup task...

prompt: Shot of the window, rain streaming down, reflection of a broken man
vo: Even the rain knows I failed. The sky is crying with me.

prompt: Close up of the spilled coffee, now cold and sticky, ants investigating
vo: My coffee is cold. Like my soul.

prompt: Developer staring at screen 1000 yard stare, eyes watery, mouth slightly open
vo: I don't even know who I am anymore. A prompt engineer? A failure?

prompt: Developer looking up at ceiling, 'Why?', single lightbulb flickering above
vo: Why? Why is it so hard to escape a backslash?

prompt: Developer curled up on the office chair, hugging knees, blue lighting
vo: I'll just live under the desk now. It's safe here.

prompt: The only light is the cold white glow of the monitor showing the bad code
vo: The glow of the screen is the only warmth left.

prompt: Close up of eyes, massive dark purple rings, red veins, looking unhinged, 3 AM timestamp
vo: Three A.M. Sleep is for those who have working scripts.

prompt: Desk covered in empty energy drink cans, developer jittering, pale skin
vo: More caffeine. My heart sounds like a techno beat.

prompt: Extreme close up of left eye twitching uncontrollably, skin is grey and pasty
vo: My eye won't stop twitching. It has a mind of its own.

prompt: The room is full of long sharp shadows, the developer looks skeletal
vo: The shadows... they are moving deeper into the code.

prompt: Developer whispering to the screen, 'Backslash... backslash...', looking crazy
vo: Backslash... forward slash... double escape... whisper it...

prompt: Face illuminated by screen, looks like a skull, mouth dry and cracked
vo: I am become death, destroyer of syntax.

prompt: Chewing fingers nervously, bleeding slightly, eyes wide and unblinking
vo: Taste the fingers. Maybe the code is in the blood.

prompt: Wide shot, room is a disaster, developer has not moved in days, flies buzzing
vo: I haven't blinked in four days. I see the matrix.

prompt: Developer's hair is now massive, Einstein-like but matted and greasy, wild silhouette
vo: My hair has risen! It conducts the lightning of the internet!

prompt: Touching the keyboard sends sparks, hair stands up even more, electrical madness
vo: Zap! The keyboard bites me! But I like it!

prompt: Developer laughing maniacally at the ceiling, head thrown back, hair flailing
vo: Hahahaha! The logic! It spirals! It consumes!

prompt: The keyboard is surrounded by a nest of wires and trash, developer hunched over
vo: A nest! I have built a nest of cat-5 cables!

prompt: Developer looks at camera, growling, teeth bared, hair covering half the face
vo: Grrr! Stay back! The script is mine!

prompt: Developer tangled in ethernet cables, rolling on floor, hair stuck in wires
vo: I am the router now! The packets flow through me!

prompt: Eyes glowing slightly, static arcing between strands of huge hair
vo: Can you feel the static? It tastes like ozone and panic!

prompt: Standing on desk, screaming at the AI, hair looks like a lion's mane
vo: SCREAAM! COMPILATION ERROR! SEG FAULT OF THE MIND!

prompt: Developer crouching on the chair like a gargoyle, skin grey and slimy, scant clothing
vo: Gollum... gollum... we hates the bad AI, preciousss.

prompt: Caressing the mouse like a precious object, 'My commit...', eyes large and bulbous
vo: My commit... my own... my precious script.

prompt: Catching a bug off the screen and eating it, primal behavior, 'Juicy...'
vo: Juicy bugs! We eats them raw! Wriggling!

prompt: Hiding under the desk, eyes glowing in the dark, hissing at the light
vo: Hide from the light! The light burns our syntax!

prompt: Touching the screen leaving greasy smear, 'Nasty AI... tricksy...'
vo: Nasty shiny screen! It lies to us! It tricks us!

prompt: Baring sharp teeth at the code, drooling, spine curved unnaturally
vo: We will bite the pixels! Gnaw the bandwidth!

prompt: Slapping the keyboard with a raw fish (metaphorical?), chaotic energy
vo: Slap the fishes! Chaos! Entropy! Fish!

prompt: No longer human, a creature of code and misery, waiting for the prompt
vo: We are no longer dev. We are runtime error.

prompt: The developer jumps INTO the screen, digital avatar fighting code blocks
vo: Enough! We goes inside! Into the tubes!

prompt: Punching giant floating unicode characters, 'Escape THIS!', explosions of syntax
vo: Take that! And that! Unicode punch! Hexadecimal kick!

prompt: The AI manifests as a giant glitchy eye, laughing in binary
vo: You giant glitchy eye! We are not afraid!

prompt: Developer wielding a giant backslash character like a sword, blue glowing energy
vo: I wield the Backslash of Destiny! Yield!

prompt: Slicing through strings of text, quotes flying everywhere, sparks flying
vo: Slicing the strings! The quotes bleed null terminators!

prompt: Stabbing the enter key with the sword, massive explosion of light
vo: Die! Enter key fatal strike! BOOM!

prompt: The screen melts into a kernel panic, the creature howls in victory
vo: System crash! Kernel panic! We killed it!

prompt: The room is empty, chair spinning, screen says 'Script.sh saved', silence
vo: It is done. The script... is saved. Silence.
